about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a Systems Engineer and Full Stack Software Developer with over 3 years of experience building user-centric digital solutions. My work focuses on front-end performance optimization, clean UI/UX, and scalable back-end logic. I am passionate about technology, problem-solving, and continuous learning.

items.text: Reduced browser rendering time by 75% (from 2 minutes to 30 seconds).
Led a team of 3 developers, improving project delivery time by 20%.
Redesigned a billing console handling large-scale datasets, achieving significant performance gains.
Reduced front-end errors by 50% within the first semester, enabling faster feature development.

jobs.title: Open International – Front End Developer
responsibilities: Maintained, fixed, and developed new features using HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript, Ext.js, React, Git, Postman, Figma, Material UI.
Led a billing console redesign project optimized for high-volume data clients.
Collaborated with back-end teams for API integrations and troubleshooting.

jobs.title: Open Intelligence – Backend Software Developer
responsibilities: Developed PL/SQL solutions to improve transaction performance and query optimization.
Fixed bugs and implemented new requirements following Agile methodologies.
Designed and executed testing for delivered features.
